label: combinedMachine
comment: A production machine combined with this production machine.
A production machine combined with this specified production device.

rangeIncludes.comment: An apparatus specified to be used to perform an activity to produce something.

domainIncludes.comment: An apparatus specified to be used to perform an activity to produce something.
An object, especially a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment, made or adapted in order to perform a production activity.
